author: vamsic007
msg: o Changes to bring RepeatedFailureLockoutLoginModule in line with http://java.sun.com/j2se/1.5.0/docs/guide/security/jaas/JAASLMDevGuide.html

author: rajith
msg: Added a very basic plain nio transport. You could flip between the transports using -Dtransport="nio". By default it's the MINA transport.
You can also turn on batching for the nio transport by using -Dbatch="true". This option has no effect on MINA.
